description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the secure boot security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-37971):

1. Identify your Windows build version from the list below and download the appropriate update package.
2. Apply the update to your system.
3. Restart your system to ensure the changes take effect.

**Build Numbers and Corresponding KB Articles**:
- Windows 11 Version 23H2: KB5040442 - 10.0.22631.3880
- Windows 11 Version 22H2: KB5040442 - 10.0.22621.3880
- Windows 10 Version 22H2: KB5040427 - 10.0.19045.4651
- Windows 10 Version 21H2: KB5040431 - 10.0.19044.4651

**Update Packages**:
- [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
- [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
- [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running one of the specified Windows builds.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
